name: Search_Hotels_By_Coordinates

docs_row.name: Search_Hotels_By_Coordinates
docs_row.func_description: Search for hotels around a given geographical coordinates.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

longitude.description: Longitude of the searched location. longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

radius.description:
The hotels that are within the radius. The radius is measured in kilometers.
Default is set to 100.
Range is between 10 to 500.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children_age.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

room_qty.description: The number of rooms that are required. The default value is set to 1.

units.description: The measurement of distance in metric or imperial.

temperature_unit.description:
The temperature unit in Fahrenheit or Celsius.
c = Celsius
f = Fahrenheit

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

latitude.description: Latitude of the searched location. latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/locationToLatLong(Location to Lat Long) endpoint in Meta collection.

response_summary:
The API response provides details about hotel accommodations in India, featuring three distinct properties with varying amenities, prices, and guest ratings.  

First, the **Cherryleen Resort Nagaon** is a 3-star hotel located in Nagaon, priced at ₹19,440 (approximately $227) for a five-night stay. It offers free cancellation, a swimming pool, and free parking, with an impressive guest rating of 8.7 ("Fabulous") based on 44 reviews. Check-in is from 12:00 PM to 5:30 PM, and check-out is until 11:00 AM.  

Next, the **Palette Palghar Irayos Resort Lifestyle Retreat** in Talāsri is a 5-star property with a discounted rate of ₹15,095 (around $176) for five nights, originally priced at ₹16,896 ($198). It has a superb rating of 9.1 from 26 reviews and allows free cancellation. Check-in starts at 12:00 PM, and check-out is until 11:00 AM.  

Lastly, the **Wabi Sabi Resort in Igatpuri** offers a mobile-exclusive discount, reducing the price from ₹38,707 ($449) to ₹34,560 ($404) for five nights. Rated 7.6 ("Good") from 48 reviews, it features a swimming pool and free parking. Check-in is between 2:00 PM and 6:00 PM, while check-out is until 11:00 AM.  

Overall, there are 4,270 available accommodations, with filters for budget, bed preferences, and room facilities. The maximum allowed stay duration is 90 days, though the default is set to 45.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers seeking hotel accommodations near specific geographic coordinates. It retrieves hotel listings based on latitude and longitude, with options to filter by price, guest count, and stay duration. The response includes detailed property information such as ratings, amenities, pricing, and cancellation policies. Users can also adjust search radius and sort results by relevance or price.

enhanced_parameters.latitude: Geographic latitude for hotel search, sourced from locationToLatLong endpoint.
enhanced_parameters.longitude: Geographic longitude for hotel search, sourced from locationToLatLong endpoint.
enhanced_parameters.radius: Search radius in kilometers (10-500 km), default 100 km.
enhanced_parameters.price_min: Minimum price filter for hotel results.
enhanced_parameters.price_max: Maximum price filter for hotel results.

primary_count.description: Total number of primary hotel accommodations available.

count.description: Total number of hotel accommodations available after filtering.

filters.description: List of available filters for refining search results.

page_loading_threshold.description: Threshold for loading additional results on the page.

applied_filters.description: List of filters currently applied to the search results.

b_max_los_data.description: Data related to the maximum length of stay allowed.

default_los.description: Default maximum length of stay in days.

has_extended_los.description: Flag indicating if extended length of stay is available (1) or not (0).

extended_los.description: Extended maximum length of stay in days.

experiment.description: Identifier for the experiment related to extended stays.

max_allowed_los.description: Absolute maximum length of stay allowed in days.

is_fullon.description: Flag indicating if the property is fully operational (1) or not (0).

extended_count.description: Number of extended stay accommodations available.

has_low_availability.description: Indicates if the property has low availability (empty if not).

children.description: List of children in the room configuration.

adults.description: Number of adults in the room configuration.

unfiltered_count.description: Total number of accommodations before any filters are applied.

unfiltered_primary_count.description: Total number of primary accommodations before any filters are applied.

result.description: List of hotel accommodations matching the search criteria.

default_wishlist_name.description: Default name for the wishlist where the hotel can be saved.

id.description: Unique identifier for the property card.

extended.description: Flag indicating if the stay is extended (1) or not (0).

review_score_word.description: Textual representation of the review score (e.g., 'Fabulous', 'Superb').

is_genius_deal.description: Flag indicating if the deal is a Genius deal (1) or not (0).

default_language.description: Default language for the hotel information.

updated_checkout.description: Updated checkout time (null if not updated).

soldout.description: Flag indicating if the hotel is sold out (1) or not (0).

unit_configuration_label.description: Label describing the room configuration (e.g., '1 bed').

preferred.description: Flag indicating if the hotel is preferred (1) or not (0).

review_score.description: Numeric review score of the hotel.

children_not_allowed.description: Flag indicating if children are not allowed (null if allowed).

preferred_plus.description: Flag indicating if the hotel is preferred plus (1) or not (0).

city_in_trans.description: Translated name of the city where the hotel is located.

min_total_price.description: Minimum total price for the stay in the hotel's currency.

main_photo_url.description: URL of the main photo of the hotel.

class_is_estimated.description: Flag indicating if the star rating is estimated (1) or not (0).

block_ids.description: List of block identifiers for the hotel.

is_tpi_exclusive_property.description: Flag indicating if the property is TPI exclusive (1) or not (0).

bwallet.description: Details about the hotel's eligibility for B-Wallet.

hotel_eligibility.description: Flag indicating if the hotel is eligible for B-Wallet (1) or not (0).

has_free_parking.description: Flag indicating if the hotel has free parking (1) or not (0).

updated_checkin.description: Updated check-in time (null if not updated).

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the hotel's location.

has_swimming_pool.description: Flag indicating if the hotel has a swimming pool (1) or not (0).

currencycode.description: Currency code for the hotel's pricing (e.g., 'INR').

is_smart_deal.description: Flag indicating if the deal is a Smart deal (1) or not (0).

urgency_message.description: Message indicating urgency (e.g., 'Only 1 left at this price').

cant_book.description: Flag indicating if the hotel cannot be booked (null if bookable).

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the hotel's location.

countrycode.description: Country code where the hotel is located (e.g., 'in' for India).

hotel_include_breakfast.description: Flag indicating if breakfast is included (1) or not (0).

is_geo_rate.description: Flag indicating if the rate is geo-specific (empty if not).

is_no_prepayment_block.description: Flag indicating if no prepayment is required (1) or not (0).

hotel_has_vb_boost.description: Flag indicating if the hotel has VB boost (1) or not (0).

badges.description: List of badges associated with the hotel.

review_nr.description: Number of reviews for the hotel.

main_photo_id.description: Unique identifier for the main photo.

is_free_cancellable.description: Flag indicating if the booking is free cancellable (1) or not (0).

value.description: Numeric value of the gross amount per night.

currency.description: Currency of the gross amount per night.

gross_amount.description: Total gross amount for the stay.

value.description: Numeric value of the total gross amount.

currency.description: Currency of the total gross amount.

all_inclusive_amount_hotel_currency.description: All-inclusive amount in the hotel's currency.

value.description: Numeric value of the all-inclusive amount.

items.description: List of items included in the price breakdown.

details.description: Additional details about the item (null if none).

value.description: Numeric value of the item amount.

benefits.description: List of benefits included in the price.

icon.description: Icon for the benefit (null if none).

translated_copy.description: Translated copy for the charges (empty if none).

included_taxes_and_charges_amount.description: Amount of included taxes and charges.

amount_unrounded.description: Unrounded amount of included taxes and charges.

value.description: Numeric value of the included taxes and charges.

currency.description: Currency of the included taxes and charges.

amount_rounded.description: Rounded amount of included taxes and charges.

has_long_stays_monthly_rate_price.description: Flag indicating if monthly rate price is available for long stays (1) or not (0).

has_long_stays_weekly_rate_price.description: Flag indicating if weekly rate price is available for long stays (1) or not (0).

value.description: Numeric value of the all-inclusive amount.
Numeric value of the net amount.

gross_amount_hotel_currency.description: Gross amount in the hotel's currency.

value.description: Numeric value of the gross amount.

excluded_amount.description: Amount excluded from the total price.

value.description: Numeric value of the excluded amount.

city.description: Name of the city where the hotel is located.

last_reservation_ellapsed_months.description: Number of months since the last reservation.

distances.description: List of distances to nearby points of interest.
